title: The complete monumental register: containing all the epitaphs, inscriptions, &c. &c. &c. in the different churches and burial-grounds, in and about Calcutta; including those of the burial-grounds of Howrah,  - Dum-dum, - Barrasut, - Barrackpore, - Pultah, - Serampore, - Chandernagore, - Chinsurah, and the convent of Bandel, together with several inscriptions from the presidencies of Madras, Bombay, Isle of France, &c.  to which is added short sketches, anecdotes &c., &c., illustrative of the public services, general characters and virtues of the dead
creator: Derozario, M.
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Derozario, M.: The complete monumental register: containing all the epitaphs, inscriptions, &c. &c. &c. in the different churches and burial-grounds, in and about Calcutta; including those of the burial-grounds of Howrah,  - Dum-dum, - Barrasut, - Barrackpore, - Pultah, - Serampore, - Chandernagore, - Chinsurah, and the convent of Bandel, together with several inscriptions from the presidencies of Madras, Bombay, Isle of France, &c.  to which is added short sketches, anecdotes &c., &c., illustrative of the public services, general characters and virtues of the dead. Calcutta  Berlin
publisher: Ferris  Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin – Preußischer Kulturbesitz, Germany
